seanchríonna |d|
============

**Seanchríonna** (IPA: [ˈʃanˠˌxɾʲiːn̪ˠa], stylized as *᚛ᚄᚓᚅᚑᚕᚏᚓᚅᚈᚐ᚜*) is a random quote
fetching console utility. Written in D.

|screenshot|

Installing
----------

+ Use latest pre-built binary from `releases <https://github.com/q60/seanchrionna/releases>`__

Building and installing manually
--------------------------------

You need *GNU make*, *DMD* and *DUB* to build **᚛ᚄᚓᚅᚑᚕᚏᚓᚅᚈᚐ᚜**.

.. code-block:: sh

    make
    sudo make install

Running
-------

.. code-block:: sh

    seanchrionna

Uninstalling
------------

.. code-block:: sh

    sudo make uninstall

.. |screenshot| image:: https://i.imgur.com/ja0YGTI.png
.. |d| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/-D-BA595E?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
